description: This file defines a Flutter widget for a birthday form page, allowing users to input a name and pick a date for a birthday entry, and then save it to a provider-managed list.

classes.name: BirthdayFormPage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that presents a form to create a new Birthday entry with name and date.

classes.name: _BirthdayFormPageState
classes.description: State class managing the birthday form UI, validation, date picking, and saving logic.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes the text editing controller when the widget is removed from the widget tree.

methods.name: _pickDate
methods.description: Shows a date picker dialog and updates the selected date state.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Validates form input, creates a Birthday object, adds it to the provider, and navigates back.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree containing the form with input fields and buttons.
